mdx.excerpt: I type at least ~70h on different Keyboards every week and in the last years I had used over 25 different ones. In this post I want to share my favorits for each situation and some tipps. My Keyboard recommendations 1.  „HomeOffice“: Filco Majestouch Convertible 2 TKL  +  Majestouch TenKeyPad 2 Professional  + Palm-Rest ➕ Design (build quality, default TKL, timeless…
